pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, January 23, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, January 23, 2017:

Calgary, Alberta

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Retreat.

Alberta Room
Fairmont Palliser Hotel
133 9 Ave SW
Calgary, Alberta

Note for media:

  • On-site coverage of the cabinet retreat open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk on site
